title: Can we please get help
body:
He threatened me, everyone on my team, and my family saying that we are worthless blah blah blah. I add him after the game and he drops this 

him: 6:54pm: what do u want
Wellperegrine02: 6:54pm: did you learn anything?
Wellperegrine02: 6:55pm: oh btw TF had more dmg and a better kda
Wellperegrine02: 6:55pm: you got HUMILIATED
Wellperegrine02: 6:55pm: let that sink in
Wellperegrine02:6:55pm: stop being a loser and start being a fucking person and treating others like so
him:: 6:55pm: lol u think i really care
Wellperegrine02:6:55pm: got it?
Wellperegrine02:6:55pm: well, good luck in life
him: 6:55pm: i will bomb ur family
Wellperegrine02:6:55pm: thats a police call right there
Wellperegrine02:6:55pm: lol
Wellperegrine02:6:55pm: oh ive done it before
Wellperegrine02:6:56pm: thats a police call right there
Wellperegrine02:6:56pm: lol
him: 6:56pm: oh ive done it before



Yes, I know the community is cancerous, BUT THIS SHIT IN NORMS, COME ON!!

replies.body:
You seem like the toxic one Wellperegrine, he's just responding.
I don't blame him.
Looks like you went out of your way to get offended. Don't be a pain, I'd rather have him in a game than you.
Like literally it's a game wtf is up with these nerds adding people after a game to complain about it, seriously just move on with your life.
